Text: Hey Guys IF it's working for you, then make sure you let it seed for a while. I will be letting this torrent seed for only a day to two.
Also if your worried about the it updating on you during the installment process, then disconnect to the web.
Just to clarify to everyone, this is still one of the beta releases. You can only test play on iOS and Android using the Runner app, you cannot built stand-alone packages for them.
